name: Facebook Marketplace (Version one)
special_instructions: The startUrls filter is required and must be a valid Facebook Marketplace URL
The limit filter is optional and determines the maximum number of items to return
The priceMin and priceMax filters are optional and can be used to filter items based on price
The entities returned include details about the author, users, runs, categories, url, and title of the marketplace listing
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
